name: SpaceRace (WelshmanDownUnder)
description:
SpaceRace is a hyper-casual game where the player must avoid obstacles to build up their score. As the player progresses more and more asteroids will be spawned.

Controls: 
- WASD or Arrow Keys to move
- ESC to pause

Future updates:

- Gems to collect
- Powerups
- Futher difference in obstacles
